HintCategory.Title: Getting Started in Tex's Office
HintCategory.Hint: Get all the <MAIL> by the door. <(Sales Flyer, Gift Certificate, Application)>
Look at the < FAX MACHINE> on top of the file cabinet.
Look at the <CRIME LINK COMPUTER> on the table behind Tex's desk.
To leave Tex's office, open the office door and walk down to the street.

HintCategory.Title: Mailing the Credit Card Application for the Electronics Shop
HintCategory.Hint: Get the <CREDIT CARD APPLICATION> for the Electronics Shop from Tex's office.
EXAMINE the <CREDIT CARD APPLICATION.>
Open the <DESK DRAWER.>
Get the <STAMP.>
Open the <DESK DRAWER.>
Get the <PEN.>
COMBINE the <PEN> and the <APPLICATION> to create a <SIGNED APPLICATION.>
COMBINE the <STAMP> and the <SIGNED APPLICATION> to create a <READY TO MAIL APPLICATION.>
Go down to the <STREET> and find the <MAILBOX.>
Use the <READY TO MAIL APPLICATION> on the <MAILBOX.>

HintCategory.Title: Getting a New Fax Machine
HintCategory.Hint: In <TEX'S OFFICE,> look at the <FAX MACHINE> on top of the file cabinet.
Mail the <CREDIT CARD APPLICATION> for the Electronic Shop. (See DIRECTORY)
Get the <CREDIT CARD> in the mail. Card will arrive in the mail on <DAY 2.>
Go to the Electronics Shop and use the <CREDIT CARD> on the <FRONT DOOR.>
Use the <CREDIT CARD> on the <BLUE LIGHT SPECIAL BOX> in the Electronics Shop.
Get the <NEW FAX MACHINE.>

HintCategory.Title: Using the Crime Link Computer
HintCategory.Hint: Look at the <COMPUTER> on the table behind Tex's desk.
Turn on the <COMPUTER.>
Enter information ~(CLUES)@ on who robbed the Pawnshop. (See DIRECTORY)
Click the appropriate trait in each category.

HintCategory.Title: Finding Out Who Robbed the Pawnshop
HintCategory.Hint: Talk to ROOK, the Pawnshop owner, and take the case.
Get the <GLASS SHARD> from the alley behind the Pawnshop.
EXAMINE the <GLASS SHARD>. ~Remember the clue for use later.@
Look at the <FOOTPRINT> in the alley. ~Remember the clue for use later.@
Go to the <NEWSSTAND> in the street and talk to <CHELSEE.>
Ask <CHELSEE> about the <BURGLARY>. ~Remember the clues for use later.@
GET the <NEWSPAPER> in front of the door at the <BREW & STEW>.
EXAMINE the <NEWSPAPER> and read article on <PAWNSHOP> robbery.
Go to the <POLICE STATION> and talk to <MAC MALDEN.>
Getting <MAC> to talk about the <MARTIAN> case will get you half way there.
Get the <BUM> in the alley to show up. (See DIRECTORY)
Get the <BUM> to cooperate. (See DIRECTORY)
Ask the <BUM> about the <BURGLARY.> ~Remember the clues for use later.@
Enter ~CLUES@ into the <CRIME LINK COMPUTER> to get name of suspect. (See DIRECTORY)

HintCategory.Title: Getting into Rusty's
HintCategory.Hint: Go into the street and look at the <DOOR> to Rusty's.
Move the <DOORMAT>.
Get the <KEY> under the doormat.
Use the <KEY> on the door to unlock it.
Open the <DOOR.>

HintCategory.Title: Getting into Rusty's Back Room
HintCategory.Hint: Look at the <EMPLOYEE'S ONLY DOOR> in <RUSTY'S.>
Find and get the <KEY>.
Use the <BACK ROOM KEY> on the <BACK ROOM DOOR.>

HintCategory.Title: Getting the Bum in the Alley to Show Up
HintCategory.Hint: Open the <DUMPSTER> and look inside.
Get the <RADIO>.
EXAMINE the RADIO.
Leave the alley through the fence or through Rook's.
Go back to the alley.

HintCategory.Title: Getting the Bum to cooperate
HintCategory.Hint: Talk to the <BUM> until he tells you about his addiction.
Go to the <BREW & STEW> and talk to <LOUIE.>
Ask <LOUIE> about <CHOCOLATE> to get chocolate pie.
Talk to <BUM> again.
Offer him the <CHOCOLATE PIE> and he'll give you some important information.

HintCategory.Title: Locating Mick Flemm
HintCategory.Hint: In Tex's office, read the <MICK FLEMM> file on the Crime Link Computer.
Locate <BEEK NARIZ.> (See DIRECTORY)
Get <BEEK> to cooperate. (See DIRECTORY)
Ask <BEEK> about <MICK FLEMM> and he'll tell you where he hangs out.
Go to the <WAREHOUSE.>

HintCategory.Title: Locating Beek Nariz
HintCategory.Hint: In Tex's office, read <MICK FLEMM'S> file on the Crime Link Computer.
Go to the <NEWSSTAND> in the street and talk to <CHELSEE.>
Ask <CHELSEE> about <BEEK> to get directions.
Go to <COIT TOWER.>

HintCategory.Title: Getting BEEK to cooperate
HintCategory.Hint: Go to <COIT TOWER> and talk to <BEEK.>
Go to Tex's office and get the <COSMETIC SURGERY GIFT CERTIFICATE.>
Go back to <COIT TOWER> and offer the <GIFT CERTIFICATE> to <BEEK.>

HintCategory.Title: Getting the Bracelet from Mick Flemm
HintCategory.Hint: Go to <COIT TOWER> and ask <BEEK> about <MICK FLEMM.>
Ask <BEEK> about <RUSTY CLOWN.>
Go to the <WAREHOUSE> and get the <KEY>.
Use the <KEY> from the warehouse on the <POWER BOX.>
Open the <POWER BOX.>
Get into <RUSTY'S.> (See DIRECTORY)
Find and get the <RUSTY CLOWN DOLL.>
COMBINE the <BATTERIES> and the <RUSTY DOLL> to get a <LIVE CLOWN DOLL.>
Go back to the <WAREHOUSE> and use the <LIVE CLOWN DOLL> on the <PULLEY HOOK.>
Hide behind the crates near the pulley control box and wait.
Get the <BRACELET> from the table.

HintCategory.Title: Getting Into the Electronics Shop
HintCategory.Hint: Mail the Electronics Shop <CREDIT CARD APPLICATION.> (See DIRECTORY)
In Tex's office, get the <CREDIT CARD> in the mail on the <SECOND DAY.>
Go to the Electronics Shop and use the <CREDIT CARD> on the <FRONT DOOR.>

HintCategory.Title: Getting Started on the Second Day
HintCategory.Hint: Get a <NEW FAX MACHINE.> and ~return to Tex's office@ (See DIRECTORY)
Get <FAX #1.>
EXAMINE <FAX #1.>
Travel to the <COUNTESS' MANSION.>

HintCategory.Title: The Countess' Case: Finding Out who has the Statuette
HintCategory.Hint: Go to the < COUNTESS' MANSION> and talk to the <COUNTESS>.
Go to the <NEWSSTAND> and talk to <CHELSEE.>
Ask <CHELSEE> about the <STATUETTE.>
Locate <FRANCO FRANCO.> (See DIRECTORY)
Get <FRANCO FRANCO> to cooperate. (See DIRECTORY)
Ask <FRANCO> about <'THE MYSTERIOUS ARTIFACT'.>

HintCategory.Title: Locating Franco Franco
HintCategory.Hint: Go to the <NEWSSTAND> and ask <CHELSEE> about the <STATUETTE.>
Go to the <POLICE STATION> and talk to <MAC MALDEN.>
Ask <MAC> about <FRANCO FRANCO.>
Go to the <PAWNSHOP> and talk to <ROOK.>
Ask <ROOK> about <JADE.>
Go to the <ALLEY> and open the <GARBAGE CAN.>
Get the <TRADE PAPER.>
EXAMINE the <TRADE PAPER>.
Travel to the <ALHAMBRA THEATER.>

HintCategory.Title: Getting Franco Franco to Cooperate
HintCategory.Hint: Go to the <THEATER> and talk to <FRANCO.>
Go to the <ALLEY> and look for a <KEY>.
Get the <KEY> from under the garbage can.
Go to the <WAREHOUSE> and get <MICK FLEMM'S KEYS> from the table.
Use the <KEYS> on the <LOCKED STORAGE COMPARTMENT> to unlock it.
Open the <STORAGE COMPARTMENT.>
Get the <STRONGBOX.>
COMBINE the <KEY FROM THE ALLEY> with the <STRONGBOX> to unlock the strongbox.
EXAMINE the <UNLOCKED STRONGBOX> to get the <JADE.>
Go back to the <THEATER> and talk to <FRANCO.>
Offer the <JADE> To <FRANCO.>

HintCategory.Title: Locating Eddie Ching
HintCategory.Hint: Go to the <THEATER> and ask <FRANCO> about <'THE MYSTERIOUS ARTIFACT'.>
Go to Tex's office and get <FAX #2.>
EXAMINE <FAX #2.>
Go to the <POLICE STATION> and talk to <MAC MALDEN.>
Ask <MAC> about the <KNICKERBOCKER.>

HintCategory.Title: Getting into the Knickerbocker
HintCategory.Hint: Go to the <POLICE STATION> and ask <MAC MALDEN> about the <KNICKERBOCKER.>
Travel to the <KNICKERBOCKER>.
Go to the Electronics Shop and talk to <HAMM UNDERWOOD.>
Fraternize with Hamm, and run with it to get info on the <KNICKERBOCKER.>
Use the <CREDIT CARD> on the <BLUE LIGHT SPECIAL BOX.>
Get the <LASERBLADE.>
Travel to the <KNICKERBOCKER.>

HintCategory.Title: Finding the Statuette
HintCategory.Hint: Get into the <KNICKERBOCKER.> (See DIRECTORY)
In <EDDIE CHING'S LIBRARY,> get the book <'THROUGH THE LOOKING GLASS'.>
EXAMINE the <BOOK> to get the <KEY.>
Go into <CHING'S HALLWAY> and turn off the <LASER NET.> (See DIRECTORY)
Go into <CHING'S STUDY> and move the <MIRROR.>
Use <CHING'S KEY> on the <SWITCH LOCK> behind the mirror.
Go into <CHING'S LIBRARY> and enter the <SECRET ROOM.>

HintCategory.Title: Turning Off the Laser Net in the Knickerbocker
HintCategory.Hint: In <EDDIE CHING'S HALLWAY,> look at the <POWER BOX> at the far end of the hallway.
Go to <RUSTY'S> and find and get the <STACKING RING.>
Find and get the <DART CROSSBOW.>
Get into <RUSTY'S BACK ROOM.> (See DIRECTORY)
Find and get the <SUCTION DART.>
COMBINE the <SUCTION DART> and the <DART CROSSBOW> to create a <LOADED CROSSBOW.>
Go back to <CHING'S HALLWAY> and use the <LOADED CROSSBOW> on the <POWER BOX.>
Look at the <LEVER> in the <POWER BOX.>
Go into < CHING'S LIBRARY> and open the <AQUARIUM.>
Use the <STACKING RING> on the <AQUARIUM> to create a <FILLED RING.>
Go back into < CHING'S HALLWAY> and use the <FILLED RING> on the <LEVER.>

HintCategory.Title: Getting the Geigger
HintCategory.Hint: Go to <CHING'S> and look at the <GEIGGER> in the tank.
Open the <CLOSET DOOR.>
Get the <GEIGGER TRAP.>
Get the <GEIGGER CHOW.>
COMBINE the <GEIGGER TRAP> and the <GEIGGER CHOW> to create a <BAITED GEIGGER TRAP.>
Use the <BAITED GEIGGER TRAP> on the <GEIGGER TANK>.

HintCategory.Title: Getting the Statuette
HintCategory.Hint: Go to <CHING'S SECRET ROOM> and <LOOK AT THE STATUETTE.> (See DIRECTORY)
Go into <CHING'S STUDY> and get the <CAPTURE NOOSE.>
Move the <PAINTING.>
Look at the <SAFE> behind the painting.
Get the <BIRTHDAY FAX.>
EXAMINE the <BIRTHDAY FAX.>
Try to open the <SAFE.>
Click the <START> key.
Click keys <101412.>
Click the <ENTER> key.
Open the <SAFE.>
Get the <SECURITY CARD.>
Go into the <SECRET ROOM> and move the <PAINTING>.
Use the <SECURITY CARD> in the <CARD SLOT> behind the painting.
Move the <EMPTY CRATE>.
Use the <CAPTURE NOOSE> on the <STATUETTE.>

HintCategory.Title: Finding Out Who Jumped You and Stole the Statuette
HintCategory.Hint: Talk to people in the neighborhood to see who knows about the <MUGGING.>
Solve <FRANCESCA'S CASE.> (See DIRECTORY)
Offer <DEVELOPED PHOTOS> to <FRANCESCA.>
Ask <FRANCESCA> about the <MUGGING.>
Locate <PUG.> (See DIRECTORY)
Go to <PUG'S ALLEY> and talk to <PUG>.
Get him to mention the <COLONEL.>
Travel to the <COLONEL'S OFFICE.>

HintCategory.Title: Francesca's Case: Getting Some Dirt on Sal Lucido
HintCategory.Hint: Go to the <SLICE O' HEAVEN PIZZA PARLOR> and get the <NOTE> from Francesca.
Go to the <BREW & STEW and talk to <LOUIE.>
Ask <LOUIE> about <SAL>.
Go into the <STREET> and find the <GARBAGE CAN.>
Open the <GARBAGE CAN.>
Get the <NOTE SCRAPS> from the <GARBAGE CAN.>
Assemble the <NOTE SCRAPS> (See DIRECTORY)
Decode the <CRYPTOGRAM.> (See DIRECTORY)
Go to the <GOLDEN GATE HOTEL LOBBY> and get past <ARDO.> (See DIRECTORY)
Get into the <HOTEL SUITE.> (See DIRECTORY)
In the <HOT TUB ROOM,> find and get the <CHAMPAGNE CORK>. (See DIRECTORY)
In the <BEDROOM,> unlock the <DESK DRAWER> and get the shoelace. (See DIRECTORY)
In the <HOT TUB ROOM,> move the <TOWEL> on the floor.
Look at the <DRAIN.>
Get the <ROLL OF FILM> out of the <DRAIN>. (See DIRECTORY)
<DEVELOP THE ROLL OF FILM.> (See DIRECTORY)

HintCategory.Title: Assembling Sal Lucido's Cryptogram Note
HintCategory.Hint: Go to the <BREW & STEW> and get the <NOTE SCRAPS> from the <GARBAGE CAN.>
EXAMINE and assemble the <NOTE SCRAPS.> (See the HELP system for instructions)
The Cryptogram Note reads: <REGENCY ESCORT SERVICE YV UZNV SIAKWBHVG RIPB ZEEIWALHVAL YWLU SUZXLWLR ZL LUV XPWLV WA LUV CIOGVA CZLV UILVO ZL LUV PXPZO LWHV. LUV EZXXYIBG LIGZR WX XWOWSIA.

HintCategory.Title: Decoding Sal Lucido's Cryptogram Note
HintCategory.Hint: EXAMINE the <NOTE> Francesca gave you. That NOTE is the KEY to the CRYPTOGRAM.
COMBINE Francesca's <NOTE> with the <ASSEMBLED NOTE SCRAPS>
EXAMINE the <ASSEMBLED NOTE SCRAPS> and the 1st line reads <We have confirmed...>

HintCategory.Title: Getting Past Ardo
HintCategory.Hint: Go to the <GOLDEN GATE HOTEL LOBBY> and talk to <ARDO>.
Find out about <INSPECTOR BURNS.>
Go to the <WAREHOUSE> and open the <CRATE.>
Go to <RUSTY'S> and turn on the TV.
Get the <FIREMAN'S UNIFORM>.
Get <INSPECTOR BURNS' MASK.>
Get the <BALLOON.>
Find the <HELIUM NOZZLE> in <RUSTY'S.>
Use the <BALLOON> on the <HELIUM NOZZLE> to fill the balloon.
COMBINE the <MASK> and <UNIFORM> to create the <INSPECTOR BURNS DISGUISE.>
Go back to the <GOLDEN GATE HOTEL LOBBY> and talk to <ARDO> as Inspector Burns.

HintCategory.Title: Getting Into the Hotel Suite (Regency Escort Service)
HintCategory.Hint: Decode Sal Lucido's Cryptogram Note. (See DIRECTORY)
Enter the password <SILICON.>

HintCategory.Title: Getting the Cork
HintCategory.Hint: Go to the <HOT TUB ROOM> in the <GOLDEN GATE HOTEL SUITE> and look at the <MOUNTED VASE.>
Go into the <BEDROOM> and open the <CLOSET DOORS.>
Get the <CHAMPAGNE GLASS.>
Go back into the <HOT TUB ROOM> and use the <CHAMPAGNE GLASS> on the <HOT TUB.>
Use the <FILLED CHAMPAGNE GLASS> on the <MOUNTED VASE.>

HintCategory.Title: Unlocking the Desk Drawer in the Bedroom of the Hotel Suite
HintCategory.Hint: In the <BEDROOM> of the <GOLDEN GATE HOTEL SUITE,> look at the <LOCKED DESK DRAWER.>
In the <HOT TUB ROOM,> get the <CHAMPAGNE CORK> out of the <MOUNTED VASE>. (DIRECTORY)
EXAMINE the <CORK> to get the <WIRE.>
Use the <WIRE> on the <LOCKED DESK DRAWER.>

HintCategory.Title: Getting the Roll of Film Out of the Drain
HintCategory.Hint: In the <HOT TUB ROOM> of the <HOTEL SUITE,> look at the <ROLL OF FILM> in the <DRAIN.>
Go into the <BEDROOM> and unlock the <DESK DRAWER.> (See DIRECTORY)
Open the <DESK DRAWER.>
Get the <SHOELACE.>
Go into the <PIANO ROOM> and get the <DEODORIZER MAGNET.>
COMBINE the <MAGNET> and the <SHOELACE> to create a <MAGNET-ON-A-STRING.>
In a <HOT TUB ROOM,> use the <MAGNET-ON-A-STRING> on the <DRAIN> to get <SCREWDRIVER.>
Use the <SCREWDRIVER> on the <DRAIN> to open it.
Get the <ROLL OF FILM.>

HintCategory.Title: Developing the Roll of Film
HintCategory.Hint: In the <HOT TUB ROOM,> get the <ROLL OF FILM> out of the <DRAIN.> (See DIRECTORY)
At the <ELECTRONICS SHOP,> use the <CREDIT CARD> on the <BLUE LIGHT SPECIAL BOX.>
Get the <FILM DEVELOPING KIT.>
COMBINE the <ROLL OF FILM> with the <DEVELOPING KIT.>

HintCategory.Title: Locating Pug
HintCategory.Hint: Go to the <SLICE O' HEAVEN PIZZA PARLOR> and ask <FRANCESCA> about <MUGGING.>
Go to <COIT TOWER> and talk to <BEEK.>
Ask <BEEK> about <PUG.>

HintCategory.Title: Getting Started on the Fourth Day
HintCategory.Hint: Go to the <COUNTESS' MANSION.>
Go back to the <COLONEL'S OFFICE.>

HintCategory.Title: What to do in the Mansion
HintCategory.Hint: Go to the <COUNTESS' MANSION> and look at the <BIRD>.
Get the <NOTE PIECES>.
Get the <WATCH>.

HintCategory.Title: Getting the Cigarette Case from the Bird
HintCategory.Hint: Go to the < COUNTESS' MANSION> and look at <BIRD>.
Go to the <HOTEL> and find something shiny.
Go back to the < COUNTESS' MANSION> and use the <GOLD FOIL> on the <BIRD.>
Get the <CIGARETTE CASE.>

HintCategory.Title: Assembling the Note in the Mansion
HintCategory.Hint: Go to the < COUNTESS' MANSION> and get the <NOTE PIECES>.
EXAMINE and assemble the <NOTE PIECES.>
The first lines of the note read: <...circumstance... progressing smoothly... delighted to hear that Murphy was able to provide the final piece of our puzzle.>

HintCategory.Title: The Colonel's Case: Getting Additional Information
HintCategory.Hint: Go to the <COLONEL'S OFFICE.>
Move the <VASE>.
Get the <EMERGENCY DISC.>
Turn on the Colonel's <COMPUTER.>
Use the <EMERGENCY DISC> on the <COMPUTER>.
Move the <FACE DOWN PICTURE FRAME>.
Look at the <PHOTO OF THE GIRL.>
Track down the Colonel's <GIRLFRIEND.> (See DIRECTORY)
Get <MELAHN TODE> to cooperate. (See DIRECTORY)
Ask <MELAHN> about the <COLONEL.>
Ask <MELAHN> about the <KEY>.
Go to the <COLONEL'S OFFICE> and use the <COLONEL'S KEY> on the Colonel's <FILE CABINET.>
Get the <CODED DOCUMENTS.>
Decode the <DOCUMENTS.> (See DIRECTORY)
EXAMINE the <DECODED DOCUMENTS.>

HintCategory.Title: Tracking Down the Colonel's Girlfriend
HintCategory.Hint: Go to the <COLONEL'S OFFICE> and look at the <PICTURE OF THE GIRL.>
Open the <DESK DRAWER.>
Get the <ENVELOPE.>
EXAMINE the <ENVELOPE> to get <MELAHN TODE'S> address.

HintCategory.Title: Getting Melahn Tode to Cooperate
HintCategory.Hint: Go to <MELAHN TODE'S APARTMENT> and talk to <MELAHN.>
Go to the <COLONEL'S OFFICE> and open the <DESK DRAWER.>
Get the <GREETING CARD.>
EXAMINE the <GREETING CARD.>
Offer <MELAHN> the <GREETING CARD.>

HintCategory.Title: The Colonel's Case: Decoding the Documents
HintCategory.Hint: Go to the <COLONEL'S OFFICE> and get the Colonel's <CODED DOCUMENTS.>
Move the <MAGAZINES>.
Get the <UPEX RECEIPT.>
EXAMINE the <RECEIPT.>
Go to <MELAHN TODE'S APARTMENT> and talk to <MELAHN>.
Ask <MELAHN> about the <UPEX RECEIPT> to get a <PAPER> with a secret combination on it.
EXAMINE the <PAPER> with the combination.
Go to the <COLONEL'S OFFICE> and move the <PAINTING.>
Try to open the <SAFE.>
Click the <LEFT KNOB 5 Times.>
Click the <CENTER KNOB 7 times.>
Click the <RIGHT KNOB 1 Time.>
Open the <SAFE.>
Get the <CODE BOOK.>
COMBINE the <CODE BOOK> with the <CODED DOCUMENTS.>

HintCategory.Title: What to do with the Decoded Documents
HintCategory.Hint: EXAMINE the <DECODED DOCUMENTS.>
Travel to the <ROADSIDE MOTEL.>
Talk to <ALAYNAH.>

HintCategory.Title: Searching G.R.S.
HintCategory.Hint: Go to <G.R.S.>
Go into the <R&D OFFICE> and get access to <PAUL DUBOIS' COMPUTER.> (See DIRECTORY)
Go into the <SUPERVISOR'S OFFICE> and find out about <EVA SCHANZEE.> (See DIRECTORY)
Get into the <HIGH SECURITY AREA.> (See DIRECTORY)
Get into the <WALL SAFE.> (See DIRECTORY)
Go into the <HALLWAY> and get into <MARCUS TUCKER'S OFFICE.> (See DIRECTORY)
Get into <MARCUS TUCKER'S SAFE.> (See DIRECTORY)
Go into the <CONFERENCE ROOM> and use the <VIDEO SCREEN.> (See DIRECTORY)

HintCategory.Title: Avoiding the G.R.S. Security Eye: In the Hallway
HintCategory.Hint: <RUN AWAY!> Or go into one of the offices.

HintCategory.Title: Avoiding the G.R.S. Security Eye: R&D Office
HintCategory.Hint: Hide between <PAUL DUBOIS' DESK> and the wall and get as close to the floor as possible.

HintCategory.Title: Avoiding the G.R.S. Security Eye: Supervisor's Office
HintCategory.Hint: Hide behind the <PARTITION WALL> in the back corner.

HintCategory.Title: Avoiding the G.R.S. Security Eye: Conference Room
HintCategory.Hint: Hide behind the <DESK.> Get as close to the floor as possible.

HintCategory.Title: Avoiding the G.R.S. Security Eye: Tucker's Office
HintCategory.Hint: Hide behind the <PLANTS.>

HintCategory.Title: Avoiding the G.R.S. Security Eye: In Tucker's Safe
HintCategory.Hint: <HURRY!> You have 30 seconds. Get out of the <SAFE.> Hide behind the <PLANT> in <TUCKER'S OFFICE.>

HintCategory.Title: Getting Access to Paul DuBois' Computer
HintCategory.Hint: Go to the <G.R.S. R&D OFFICE> and look at Paul DuBois' <COMPUTER.>
Get the <PENNANT.>
EXAMINE the <PENNANT> to get <PAUL DUBOIS' COMPUTER CARD.>
Turn on Paul DuBois' <COMPUTER>.
Use <PAUL DUBOIS' COMPUTER CARD> on Paul DuBois' <COMPUTER.>

HintCategory.Title: Finding out about Eva Schanzee
HintCategory.Hint: Go to the <G.R.S. SUPERVISOR'S OFFICE> and get into the <HIGH SECURITY AREA.> (DIRECTORY)
Get the <MINI-DISK> in the High Security Area.
Leave the <HIGH SECURITY AREA>. Go to Eva Schanzee's <COMPUTER> and turn it <ON>.
Get <EVA'S COMPUTER CARD.>
Use <EVA'S COMPUTER CARD> on Eva Schanzee's <COMPUTER.>
Use the <MINI-DISK> on Eva Schanzee's <COMPUTER.>

HintCategory.Title: Getting Into the High Security Area
HintCategory.Hint: Go to <CHING'S LIBRARY> and get the <GEIGGER>. (See DIRECTORY)
Go to the <G.R.S. R&D OFFICE> and get the <WRENCH.>
Go to the <G.R.S. SUPERVISOR'S OFFICE> and use the <WRENCH> on the <VENT>.
Use the <GEIGGER> on the <VENT OPENING.>

HintCategory.Title: Getting into the Wall Safe in the Supervisor's Office
HintCategory.Hint: Go into the <G.R.S. SUPERVISOR'S OFFICE> and look at the <SAFE.>
Go to <TUCKER'S OFFICE> and open the <DESK DRAWER.>
Look at the <PIECE OF MASKING TAPE> to see the 6-digit code <142235.>
Go back to the <SUPERVISOR'S OFFICE> and enter the numbers <142235> on the <SAFE KEYPAD>.

HintCategory.Title: Getting into Marcus Tucker's Office
HintCategory.Hint: Go to the <G.R.S. HALLWAY> and look at <SECURITY PANEL> by the door to <TUCKER'S OFFICE.>
In the <G.R.S. SUPERVISOR'S OFFICE,> get into the <HIGH SECURITY AREA.> (See DIRECTORY)
In the <HIGH SECURITY AREA,> open the <DESK DRAWER.>
Get the <PASSCARD.>
Use the <PASSCARD> on the <SECURITY PANEL> by Tucker's office door.
Open the door to <TUCKER'S OFFICE.>

HintCategory.Title: Getting into Marcus Tucker's Safe
HintCategory.Hint: Look at the <SAFE> in <TUCKER'S OFFICE.>
Look at the <ACCESS PANEL> by the <SAFE.>
Go into the <R&D OFFICE> and find and get the <TV.>
Go into the <CONFERENCE ROOM> and open the <DESK DRAWER.>
Get the <LASER DISC PLAYER.>
Go into the <HIGH SECURITY AREA> in the <SUPERVISOR'S OFFICE> and get the <LASER DISC.>
COMBINE the <LASER DISC PLAYER> and the <TV> to create <A.V. EQUIPMENT.>
COMBINE the <LASER DISC> and the <A.V. EQUIPMENT> to create <LOADED A.V. EQUIPMENT.>
Go to <TUCKER'S OFFICE> and use the <LOADED A.V. EQUIPMENT> on the <ACCESS PANEL.>

HintCategory.Title: What to do in Marcus Tucker's Safe
HintCategory.Hint: Get into <MARCUS TUCKER'S SAFE>. (See DIRECTORY)
Get the <VIDEO CASSETTE.>
Get the <BUDDHA STATUE.>
Look in the <WASTEBASKET.>
Get the <NOTE SHREDS.>

HintCategory.Title: Using the Video Screen in the Conference Room
HintCategory.Hint: Look at the <VIDEO SCREEN.>
Find and get the <KEY>.
Use the <CABINET KEY> on the <CABINET> under the video screen.
Open the <CABINET> and look at the <VCR.>
Get into <MARCUS TUCKER'S OFFICE.> (See DIRECTORY)
Get into Marcus Tucker's <SAFE.> (See DIRECTORY)
Get the <VIDEO CASSETTE> from the <SAFE.>
Go back into the <CONFERENCE ROOM> and turn on the <VCR.>
Use the <VIDEO CASSETTE> on the <VCR>.
Find the <REMOTE PAD> and turn <ON> the video display.

HintCategory.Title: What to do with the Winter Chip
HintCategory.Hint: EXAMINE the <BUDDHA STATUE> to get the <WINTER CHIP>
Go to the <COUNTESS' MANSION> and get the <WATCH>
Examine the <WATCH>
Combine the <WATCH> with the <WINTER CHIP>

HintCategory.Title: Disposing of the Chameleon
HintCategory.Hint: In the <BASTION,> look at the <CHAMELEON.
Go to the <COUNTESS' MANSION> and get the <CIGARETTE CASE> from the bird. (See DIRECTORY)
EXAMINE the <CIGARETTE CASE> to get the <CIGARETTE.>
Go to the <G.R.S. SUPERVISOR'S OFFICE> and get into the <WALL SAFE.> (See DIRECTORY
Get the <VIRAL POWDER.>
Go into <TUCKER'S OFFICE> and open the <DESK DRAWER.>
Get the <MATCH.>
Go back to the <BASTION> and distract the <CHAMELEON.> (See DIRECTORY)
COMBINE the <CIGARETTE> and the <VIRAL POWDER> to create a <LETHAL CIGARETTE.>
COMBINE the <LETHAL CIGARETTE> with the <MATCH> to create a <LIT LETHAL CIGARETTE.>
Use the <LIT LETHAL CIGARETTE> on the <TABLE> in the <MAIN HALL>.

HintCategory.Title: Distracting the Chameleon
HintCategory.Hint: In the <HALLWAY> in the <BASTION>, look at the <EXPENSIVE VASE>.
Get the <BUNGEE STRAP.>
Get the <GEMSTONE> from a piece of art.
Get the <CLAMP>.
COMBINE the <CLAMP> and the <BUNGEE STRAP> to create a <SLINGSHOT.>
COMBINE the <SLINGSHOT> and the <GEMSTONE> to create a <LOADED SLINGSHOT.>
Use the <LOADED SLINGSHOT> on the <VASE.>

HintCategory.Title: Getting Alaynah out of the Force Field
HintCategory.Hint: In the <BASTION MAIN ROOM,> look at <ALAYNAH.>
Move the <SHIELD>.
Turn <OFF> the <SWITCH.>

HintCategory.Title: Getting Past the Bartender
HintCategory.Hint: In the <BROKEN SKULL BAR,> talk to the <BARTENDER.>
Start by <ORDERING A MANLY DRINK.>
Offer her <$100> bill.
Choose attitude A or B.
When she asks for the <TOKEN,> use attitude B.
Find the <TOKEN.> (See DIRECTORY)
Talk to the <BARTENDER> again.
Respond with attitude <A or B.>
Offer her the <SILVER DOLLAR.>

HintCategory.Title: Getting to the Broken Skull
HintCategory.Hint: In the <BASTION MAIN ROOM,> get the <BROKEN SKULL> reference from <ALAYNAH.>
Go to the <NEWSSTAND> and talk to <CHELSEE.>
Ask about the <BROKEN SKULL.>
Travel to the <BROKEN SKULL.>

HintCategory.Title: Finding the Token
HintCategory.Hint: Talk to the <BARTENDER> at the <BROKEN SKULL> to find out about the <TOKEN.>
Go to the <ROADSIDE MOTEL> and talk to <ALAYNAH.>
Ask <ALAYNAH> about the <TOKEN.>
Go to the <PAWNSHOP> and talk to <ROOK.>
Ask <ROOK> about the <SILVER DOLLAR>.

HintCategory.Title: Ferrelette
HintCategory.Hint: Talk to <FERREL PUS>
At the end of round 1, the correct ball is in the same position, even after reload.
If you choose the wrong ball, reload and pick a differnt one.
Each time you pick incorrectly, your odds of guessing correctly go from 4:1 to 3:1.
The correct ball may or may not be in the same position as the previous round.

HintCategory.Title: Escaping from the Arboretum
HintCategory.Hint: In the <MOON CHILD ARBORETUM,> look at the <DOOR.>
Look at the <SMOKE ALARM> on the wall above the door.
Look at the <PILE OF LEAVES.>
Open the <WALL PANEL.>
Get the <LIGHTER FLUID.>
Find and get the <RAKE.>
Find and get the <FLINT.>
Find and get the <STONE.>
Use the <RAKE> on the <PILE OF LEAVES.>
Use the <LIGHTER FLUID> on the <PILE OF LEAVES.>
COMBINE the <FLINT> with the <STONE> to create <SPARKS.>
Use the <SPARKS> on the <PILE OF LEAVES.>

HintCategory.Title: What to do after Escaping from the Arboretum.
HintCategory.Hint: In the <MOON CHILD HALLWAY,> find the <STASIS ROOM DOOR.>
Open the <STASIS ROOM DOOR> and enter.

HintCategory.Title: Resuscitating Eva Schanzee
HintCategory.Hint: Move one of the sliders.
Move one of the sliders.
Select a button.
Select a button.
Move one of the sliders.
Select a button.
Select a button.
Move one of the sliders.
Move one of the sliders.
Move one of the sliders.
Select a button.
Select a button.

HintCategory.Title: Finding the Mini-Computer
HintCategory.Hint: EXAMINE the <MISSION PAPER.>
Get the <KEY> from <EVA SCHANZEE.>
In the <MOON CHILD OBSERVATORY,> use <EVA'S KEY> on the <WALL PANEL.>
Open the <WALL PANEL.>
Move the <LINKS 986 BOX.>
Get the <MINI-COMPUTER.>

HintCategory.Title: Finding a Computer Cable
HintCategory.Hint: EXAMINE the <MISSION PAPER.>
In the <MOON CHILD OBSERVATORY,> move the plant to expose the <FLOOR PANEL.>
Look at the <FLOOR PANEL.>
Go into the <MOON CHILD HALLWAY> and find and get the <PIPE.>
Go back into the <OBSERVATORY> and use the <PIPE> on the <FLOOR PANEL> to open it.
Get the <COMPUTER CABLE.>

HintCategory.Title: Locating the Moon Child Computer
HintCategory.Hint: EXAMINE the <MISSION PAPER.>
Go into the <MOON CHILD OBSERVATORY> and get the <COCKTAIL GLASS.>
EXAMINE the <COCKTAIL GLASS> to get the <FLEX-STRAW.>
Find the <RECESSED BUTTON> on the wall.
Use the <FLEX-STRAW> on the <RECESSED BUTTON.>

HintCategory.Title: Disabling the Moon Child Computer
HintCategory.Hint: Get the <MINI-COMPUTER.> (See DIRECTORY.)
COMBINE <MINI-COMPUTER> with <WINTER CHIP> to get <COMPUTER VIRUS LINK-UP>.
COMBINE <COMPUTER VIRUS LINK-UP> with <COMPUTER CABLE> to get <VIRUS LINK CONNECTION>.
Use the <COMPUTER VIRUS LINK CONNECTION> on the <MOON CHILD COMPUTER.>

HintCategory.Title: Getting to The Engineering Corridors
HintCategory.Hint: In the <MOON CHILD HALLWAY>, find the <DEAD GUARD.>
Get the guard's <I.D. BADGE.>
Go to the <EMERGENCY EXIT DOOR.>
Use the <I.D. BADGE> on the <ACCESS PANEL.>

HintCategory.Title: Getting Started on the Fifth Day
HintCategory.Hint: EXAMINE the <NOTE SHREDS.> The top line reads <'Brother Marcus:'>
The second line reads <'We are seekers of purity who....'>
Travel to the <BASTION OF SANCTITY>

HintCategory.Title: Finding some Work
HintCategory.Hint: Go to the <PAWNSHOP> and talk to <ROOK>.
Find out what is bothering <ROOK> and accept the <CASE>.
